Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.scenes

Interface SceneMethods

All Known Implementing Classes:
Editing, GameOver, Menu, Playing, Settings
public interface SceneMethods
Defines a default set of methods that are required to be implemented by all subclasses inheriting game scenes.
Used by all scenes by default to render graphics and listen to mouse movement or interaction.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Method Details

    • render

      void render​(Graphics graphics)
      Defines that all game scenes must be able to render graphics.
      Parameters:
      graphics - - Responsible for drawing objects to the screen.

    • mouseClicked

      void mouseClicked​(int x, int y)
      Defines that all game scenes must be able to listen to mouse clicks.
      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

    • mouseMoved

      void mouseMoved​(int x, int y)
      Defines that all game scenes must be able to listen to mouse movement.
      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

    • mousePressed

      Defines that all game scenes must be able to listen to mouse presses.
      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

    • mouseReleased

      void mouseReleased​(int x, int y)
      Defines that all game scenes must be able to listen to mouse releases.
      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.
